title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Slowing down from the fast pace of events allows you to take care of business and your loved ones today. The interpersonal Libra New Moon energizes your 3rd House of Communication and Communion, motivating you to transition from going through the motions to connecting with emotion. Get in touch with your feelings before you act or speak on a situation. Listen to the needs of those who matter. Question your heart as much as your head when planning your next move. Author Jack Kornfield wrote, When we get too caught up in the busyness of the world, we lose connection with one another -- and ourselves. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
